Agentforce transforms Sales, Service, Commerce, Marketing, IT, and more by uniting apps, data, and agents on one trusted platform. Now every department is an engine for growing customer success — from Sales following up on every lead instantly to Service delivering 24/7 expertise. Proven ROI, delivered. Explore Agentforce Calculate your ROI Grow fast with our free CRM. See value from day one with our free, all-in-one CRM built for small businesses . Stop juggling spreadsheets and disconnected apps. This is key to serving our real estate customers with the empathy they deserve. See the Ambuja Neotia story VP, Strategy & Transformation, PepsiCo Tracy Matis See PepsiCo story Business Owner of Salesforce ONE.CRM & Customer Care, Volkswagen Group Stephanie Paetow Agentforce will enable us to have personalization across those customer journey pre-sales sales and after sales. But we don’t have 80 million staff to be able to scale it, and the only way to do that is to innovate. In our case it’s innovating through the use of Salesforce. Salesforce is constantly innovating and constantly creating new value. I just can't say enough about how well the teams have come together to delight our customers. With trust and governance built in, Salesforce ensures your AI and business scale securely, reliably, and with confidence. See all products Launch faster with 16+ Agentforce

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex, and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their data management and gain valuable insights. Can I speak with the CTO, please?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: This is John, the CTO. What's this about?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi John, thanks for taking my call. I came across your company and noticed that you're using a range of different tools for data management. I'd like to introduce you to DeepData AI, which can help you unify your data and improve your decision-making.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: We're already using Salesforce for our CRM needs, and we're pretty happy with it. What makes you think we need another solution?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that you're invested in Salesforce, but DeepData AI is designed to complement your existing tools, not replace them. Our solution can help you process and analyze large amounts of data from various sources, including Salesforce, to gain deeper insights into your customers and operations.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure we have the budget for another tool right now. We're trying to optimize our existing investments before adding new ones. Plus, I'm not convinced that your solution would integrate seamlessly with our current systems.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns, John. However, I'd like to offer a customized demo to show you how DeepData AI can integrate with your existing tools, including Salesforce, and provide a clear ROI. We've had success with similar companies in the past, and I believe we can help you achieve significant efficiency gains.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but I don't think we're ready to move forward with a demo at this time. We're in the middle of a major project, and our priorities are focused elsewhere. Maybe send me an email with more information, and I'll review it when I have a chance.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand, John. I'll send you an email with some case studies and more details about our solution. However, I want to make sure you're aware that we're offering a limited-time discount for new customers, and I'd hate for you to miss out on that opportunity.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Like I said, send me an email, and I'll take a look. But to be honest, I don't think we'll be moving forward with this anytime soon. We're just not interested in adding another tool to our stack right now.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Integration
Feedback: The seller should have more effectively addressed the buyer's integration concerns and provided concrete examples of successful integrations with similar companies to alleviate doubts. Sentiment: Neutral

parsed.feedback: The seller should have more effectively addressed the buyer's integration concerns and provided concrete examples of successful integrations with similar companies to alleviate doubts. Sentiment: Neutral
